titleStmt.title: The good old way, or, A discourse offer'd to all true-hearted Protestants concerning the ancient way of the Church and the conformity of the Church of England thereunto, as to its government, manner of worship, rites, and customs / by Edward Pelling.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, Edward, d. 1718.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
